review: Awesome -- If You're a Prime Member, there's nothing to beat it.  Movies, TV, your music.  Everything.  It's literally plug in a go.  As long as you have wifi, all you have to do is plug the stick in to your tv and into a plug on the wall, log in to your wifi, and then you are good to go.  I bought this because my "classic" Roku was becoming obsolete -- Roku offered some good deals on an updated Roku device, but because I can play all my Amazon music (I'm a Prime Member and have all  my music via Amazon), I went for the Fire Stick without a second thought.  My tv is connected to Bose speakers, so now I can stream my music and everything else.  Just get it.  It's the best.
